answers.answer: 2 table spoons if you don't start labor you can safely repeat the dose in 3-4 hrs to try again. Sometimes it takes more than once. Two doses instead of one large decreases the chances of diarrhea and dehydration because of diarrhea. Good luck I have used it and yes it worked for me. If your body is ready it works wonders.
My friends wife just used it 2 n a half days ago n last night they had there baby but the diarrhea was bad b4 it worked just a heads up

question: I am 39 weeks and suffered from preeclampsia in my last pregnancy and was wondering if anyone took castor oil to help start labor ...how much??  Did it work??
title: Castor oil ???
